general_advisory: Heavy rainfall observed, ensure proper drainage in fields. Control pest infestations and diseases in crops as per guidelines provided.

advisory: Blister beetles feed on flowers, manually collect and dispose of the insects.
Manage Gull fly infestation by removing infested capsules and using neem-based pesticides.
Stem rot may occur after heavy rainfall, spray fungicide to manage.
Recommended fungicides: Validamycin 3% L or Captan 70% + Hexaconazole 5%.
Watch for wilting and root rot after heavy rainfall.
Use Streptocycline and Metalaxyl 8% + Mancozeb solution to manage diseases.
Monitor for wilting and root rot issues.
Utilize Streptocycline and Metalaxyl 8% + Mancozeb solution for disease management.
Check for wilting and root rot post heavy rainfall.
Apply Streptocycline and Metalaxyl 8% + Mancozeb solution to address diseases.
Be cautious of Downy Mildew infestation in cucurbits after heavy rainfall.
Control with Copper Hydroxide 77% WP, Fosetyl-AL 80% WP, or Carbendazim 12% + Mancozeb 63% WP.
Control Gram pod borer with Emamactin benzoate spray.
Manage Papaya Crown rot with Copper Oxychloride, Carbendazim, or Thiophanate Methyl sprays.
Drain excess water from fields and earth up newly planted bananas.
For Sigatoka disease control, spray Mancozeb 75% WP, Zineb 75% WP, or Carbendazim 12% + Mancozeb 63% WP.
Decreased salinity post heavy rainfall, use alky-dimethyl-benzyl ammonium chloride as disinfectant.
